"well hello there cutie" your dad says to the 8 year old girl who is just sitting on a stump crying, something tells you to run but at the moment you seem not to be able to move, your dad approaches the girl
"what's wrong?" he asks

"I'm hungry" the little girl says sniffling "and i don't know where my family is" she adds you get a shiver something isn't right here, you heard rumors about these woods,
rumors that sometimes people came in but never came out,

"son do you have any food in your backpack we can give this girl?" your dad asks looking at you

Suddenly The little girl turns full wolf attacking your dad ripping him to shreds and eating anything that comes out of him

While your dad is looking at you she smiles and points behind you, you look to see 4 more wolves

"i got a way to fix your problem of not having any food" your dad says "hungry son?" you smile and suddenly both you and your dad turn into full wolves and attack the little girl eating her up
1153.title: Little Girl

11532.content:
"wow, those are big wolves" your dad says you roll your eyes and try not to pee yourself out of fear

"dad i think we're going to die here" you say the four wolves surround you licking their lips the little girl laughs

"oh you will die, not right away though, my pets tend to eat very very slowly" she says giggling, you don't know what's more disturbing the little girl giggling or the four large

wolves surrounding you "well son at least we got to spend some quality time together" your dad says that is the last thing you hear as all 4 wolves jump on you

"they have no intention of killing you" the little girl says "they're in heat and they want to mate, and i just found 2 perfectly good male humans for them to do it with" the

little girl says giggling "now will my pets tear off your clothes or are you willing to take them off yourself?" she asks
11532.title: Wolves behind you

12.content: you look at yourself your a woman slender with freckles you wearing what seems to a a tank top and jeans with hiking boots and a heavy backpack. you whip around at the sound of branches snapping and rustling leaves. the scent of dog come heavy in the air but it's stronger…more musty. it sounds like it coming form your left…you go to your right moving slowly, whatever you heard sounded big…you do NOT want to provoke it's hunting instinct by stupidly running you have a large hunting knife on your belt which was supposed to be for cutting vines and tall grass out of your way and you walked through the forest…but judging form how eerily quiet the woods are it would be more then some handheld weed whacker. your long russet curls mov dint your face as you carefully move away from the noise. your thankful your knife is silver.as you move along carefully you hear a growl…now you Know there is going to be trouble. you have two choices now.
12.title: female

choices: The little doggy is more then what it seems
The Dog Yelps And The Boy Screams
121.content:
"so that is how you react when you hear a growl, take out your knife and get all offensive?" you hear a voice you turn around it's a boy about 12, his dog is growling at you a small little Chihuahua Dog, you put your knife away and roll your eyes
"you shouldn't sneak up on people like that" you say to the boy as you put your knife away

"you shouldn't bring out large knives" the boy says he smiles and looks at the little dog "then again you shouldn't of put it away so quickly" Suddenly the little dog grabs your leg pulling you to the ground, the dog is strong for something so small, but then you notice the dog is starting to grow

The boy just gives you a dirty look and walks pass you, you put your knife away and decide to walk the other way, when suddenly you hear a dog yelp and the boy scream instincts tell you to go run and see what happened, since you were in the marines after all

After a few minutes it's quiet again and you continue to walk
121.title: take out your knife

122.content:
As Amy looked up to the sky she realized she had never seen a full moon quite so bright before. It was shinning brightly illuminating the entire forest. This day long hike she had decided to go on had definitely taken a sour turn. First her cell phone battery died and then she had taken a wrong turn and gotten lost. Now she was desperate to get home but all she had was her compass and instincts at this point.

As she turned a corner she saw what looked like a cliff as she sighed with relief. If she could get to the top of that ridge she could see the entire forest and get back to her campground. As she made her way to towards the ridge she stopped as she saw something on top of cliff. She couldn't quite tell what it was as she struggled to see it. At first it looked like a wolf but it far to big...."Maybe it's a bear?" Amy thought as she squinted her eyes more. That's when she froze as her eyes went wide. The animal suddenly stood up in its hind legs like a human as she got a better look at it. It definitely looked like a wolf but not like One she had ever seen.

http://i1028.photobucket.com/albums/y345...

As the wolf creature stood in its hind legs it gazed up towards the full moon as it let out one of the loudest howls Amy had ever heard. Amy had to cover her ears it was so loud as she tried to back away from the giant wolf before it spotted her. Just then it started sniffing....the wolf beast dropped down to all fours again sniffing the air before its gaze suddenly fell right into Amy who was now frozen in fear. It's eyes were a bright yellow almost glowing in the darkness. It slowly looked down on her as it licked its fangs slowly before making what had to be an impossible feat. The wolf leapt from the cliff fell over 100 feat before landing on the forest ground uninjured before growling deeply as it began stalking its prey....

Any was almost too terrified to move...her legs were shaking with fear so bad she could barely move. Slowly she reached down and pulled out the long silver knife her grandfather had given her years ago. She had to make a choice now to fight or to run....her hands were shaking as tears ran down her face....she knew she couldn't fight it so she did the only other thing she could....run....
122.title: start running!

choices: Amy wakes up in the hospital sometime later
Amy wakes up back at camp
1221.content:
Amy started running as fast as she could. Using every ounce of strength she had she felt the adrenaline pouring into her body as she fled for her life. However no matter hard she ran the footsteps of the wolf beast behind her never went away. She was too terrified to look back at this point. She didn't know if the wolf was right behind her or if the beast was just toying with her.

As she ran with every ounce of speed she had any looked for anything to hide her or escape with. The problem was she was in a large national forest very few places to hide. At least where the wolf would not be able to find her. As she ran suddenly she spotted something! A large fallen hollowed out tree! it looked barely big enough for her. Thankfully Amy was quite petite at only 5'4 and 105lbs. She dove at the log and began crawling her way through the opening trying get away from wolf hot on her trail.

She was almost fully tucked away inside the tree as she tried to pull her legs inside when suddenly she felt a sudden stabbing pain in her left foot. Crying out in pain she looked down to see the wolf had bitten all the way through her hiking boot and its fangs were digging into her left foot and ankle. Amy cried out in pain as the wolf was trying to drag her out of the tree but Amy refused to give up.

Using her other foot she began kicking furiously at the beast focusing on its sensitive nose kicking it over and over again with every ounce of strength she had. Finally the beast released her as she pulled herself inside the tree. The pain in her leg was intense as she reached down and touched the wound feeling the blood that was soaking up her sock and boot. Amy clutched the knife desperately as she wolf the wolf jumping around and sniffing and scratching at the tree trying to find a weakness.

She pleaded and prayed that the beast would give up but she continued to hear it growl. Just when Amy was about to lose hope she heard the growling stop as the footsteps seemed to be moving away. Amy let out a large sigh of relief but it was quickly short lived....without warning the top of the tree she was hiding in was ripped away, pulled part with immense strength by the wolf who now stood on its hind legs once more. Amy had no idea what kind of beast was capable of something like this both physically or mentally...the wolf actually seemed to be thinking....

Reaching down the wolf grabbed Amy and pulled her out of the tree. It's hands were much more like human hands with opposable thumbs and everything. Amy screamed and kicked trying to break free of the beast's grasp as she scrambled to reach for the knife she had dropped. As the wolf pulled her out of the log Amy barely managed to grasp the hilt of the knife as she grabbed it tightly and plunged it into the chest of the wolf.....

As Amy stabbed the beast which had grasped her the wolf suddenly stopped...its grip released as Amy fell back down as the wolf seemed to pause for a second before looking at the knife in its chest. The weird thing was Amy noticed the wound was bleeding, but smoking....steam was rising out of the wound as if the blood of the wolf itself was evaporating....the wolf began to stumble backwards for a second before it let out a loud whimper of pain before it suddenly fell down. It was howling in agony as it seemed unable to touch the blade...Amy didn't know what to make of this...was the beast allergic to the silver the knife was made of?

Not wanting to take any more chances Amy summoned the last of her energy and rage to do the unthinkable. She charged at the wolf...she reached over and grabbed her knife and pushed it deeper into the wolf. She heard it howl in pain more as Amy took the blade with withdrew it and quickly stabbed the creature several more times before the wolf finally could not take it and began to flee. It stumbled away slowly whimpering and howling in pain befire vanishing into the woods.

Amy took a deep breath and sighed with relief. She wasn't sure if the beast was dead or not but she was safe for now. Looking to her knife she saw something odd. The blood of the wolf was coated on the knife was it was evaporating as if her knife was red hot...soon it had all but vanished off the blade the inscription from her grandfather became visible.

"Be Vigilant Against the Coming Darkness."

The words seemed to echo into her mind as Amy soon found her eyes growing heavy....she had lost a lot of blood and with the adrenaline fading her strength had given out. Soon she collapsed on the ground wondering if this was how she was going to die....alone in the woods...As her eyes began to close she suddenly heard barking in the distance....however this was no wolf sound, it was the sound of a rescue dog leading her old camping group to her location. With the last of her consciousness Amy smiled as she felt a dog licking her cheek and barking as familiar human voices grew closer to her location.
1221.title: Amy tries to escape

choices: Amy has strange dreams that night
12211.content:
Bright lights soon barraged Amy's senses as familar voices surrounded her. Opening her eyes slowly she gazed up looking up to see she was in a hospital room. There was a nurse and Doctor standing close by as well as three familar faces, her Mom, Dad, and boyfriend Eddie.

"Doctor she's finally awake!" Amy heard her mom cry out as she felt loving arms embrace her. Tears ran down her mothers face as her family came and held her closely. The doctors were careful in helping her sit up slowly. Her left foot was wrapped up in a large bandage and there were several more bandages around her body.

"You have us quite a scare kiddo." Her dad said smiling through his tears of joy as Eddie came and held her hand.

"When you didn't come back from your hike I took Buster and the rest if the camp ground and we went searching for you. Luckily he sniffed you out but you had already lost a lot of blood from the animal attack. We rushed to give you first aid but you slipped into a coma by the time the helicopter arrived." Eddie said as he gripped her hand tightly.

Eddie was the campground head councilor and had met Amy when she went there as a camper three years ago. Now she was 18 and he was 21 and she was there training to be a camp councilor. They had been officially dating now for about 8 months. Things went pretty slow at first because she was still in high school but now that she just graduated she hoped they could take their relationship to the next level soon.

"Do you remember what attacked you? We couldn't find any traces of blood or animal fur anywhere close to you." Eddie asked as Amy tried to remember.

"It was...a wolf...a strange wolf....I've never seen seen one that big or act like that before..." Amy said as the memories of the attack gave her chills. "

"I doubt it was a wolf Miss Wilson." The doctor said who had been waiting in the room patiently. "Those bite marks I treated were far to deep and large to match any known species of wolf. I believe it had to have been some kind of bear....perhaps starving or rabid...that's why we gave you all the proper treatments to protect you.

"Listen I'm telling you what I saw! It was a huge wolf! It even stood up on two legs! It seemed smart and cunning like it was hunting me the whole time!" Amy said angered that no one seemed to believe her.

"Listen sweetie it was traumatic, who knows what you really saw? The important thing is your safe now." Eddie said as he held her hand tightly.

"Well we want to keep you one more night for observation so tomorrow morning you are free to return home." The doctors said as everyone was escorted out of the room so Amy could rest.
12211.title: Amy wakes up in the hospital sometime later

choices: The next day Amy goes home
122111.content:
That night Amy looked over to all the get well cards she had received. Most were from her close family and friends and she loved reading their funny little comments on the cards they left. She had been out for almost a week before she has awoken, it felt weird to her to have been out for that long. As she fumbled through the cards she suddenly saw a letter with to "From" on it. Strange she thought as she picked up the letter and read it.

"You are in danger...the curse has been passed onto you. Once the changes start you must find me. Once you are ready follow the scent of blood to my location."

Amy looked over the creepy note and saw there was nothing else. "What the hell is this person talking about?" She wondered so curses aren't real and how is she supposed to follow a scent to find some one?

Discarding the note she crumbled it up and tossed it away, thinking it a silly joke. That night she turned on the TV and turned it over to the local late night news.

"In today's top story a local man is found stabbed dead and naked just a few miles away from a local kids camp ground." The achievement said as Amy watched the story.

Apparently the man was a known vagrant with a long criminal past. He had been stabbed several times in the chest and left out in the woods and stripped of all his clothes.

Amy's eyes widened when she realized that was right next to her attack! She began to worry that maybe there was a connection as she feared maybe other people know about that strange beast that attacked her. Could they have dumped that body there in hopes the beast would eat it? The thought maybe her suck as she quickly turned off the TV and went to sleep.
122111.title: Amy receives a strange note

choices: The next morning Amy notices some changes...
That night Amy has strange dreams
1221111.content:
Her family came and got her the next day. Amy was excited to get out of the hospital and go home. The doctor said she would still have to be in recovery for another couple weeks but some reason Amy actually felt fine. She had been noticing it all day in fact. She actually felt better than she had in a long time. Her energy was up, everything smelled stronger, and she could even hear better.

Once she was home her parents took her upstairs to rest. She had been given crutches to walk since her left foot was in a banfage but for some reason she felt like she didn't even need it. After her parents had left for work she decided to get her foot free and examine the wound. Taking a knife she cut the bandages and took them off slowly. Once her foot was free she examined the wound her eyes suddenly widened.

The doctors had warned her that there would be some scarring from the bite but she didn't expect it to look like this. The bite mark on her ankle and foot was black....one could say it looked infected but there was no outside swelling or inflamed tissue. In a strange way it almost looked more like a tatoo of a wolf bite than an actual bite scar. The wound had seemingly healed perfectly but she was going to have to get used these markings on her now.

She thought back to the note from before and shook it off. She spent the rest of the day on the Internet looking up different kinds of animals in hopes of getting some kind answers as to what the hell attacked her that night.
1221111.title: The next day Amy goes home

12211111.content:
Amy woke up the next morning as she felt something tickling her neck. Reaching back she felt her hair brushing against her as she nodded off again before suddenly realizing something....she didn't have long hair! Amy jumped out of bed and went to the mirror and covered her mouth when she saw her hair. It had grown at least three inches over night! Her normal brunette hair was usually cut right below ear level for her. Now it covered her ears entirely and even brushed down a little past her neck...she also noticed her normally well kept locks were a bit more untamed now. Her hair seemed a bit wilder than usual. She tried to think of an explanation for all this but she couldnt think of anything rational.

After jumping in the shower and washing her new longer hair Amy decided she should go out today. She hadn't gone shopping since the camping trip and for some reason she had a strange desire for something sexy...

After the shower she saw there was a text on her phone. Looking at it Amy raised a brow as she saw it was from a blocked number.

"Beauty and Lust are marks of the beast....tonight is the first night find me before the beast comes calling on the third night..."

"What the hell is this? How the hell did they get her number?" She thought as she had almost forgotten that stupid letter from the hospital but now it seemed like someone wasn't satisfied with her just yet.

Getting dressed Amy noticed her jeans and shirt were a bit too tight. She hadn't really gained any weight they just seemed smaller then usual to her....putting on some sweats and an over sized t shirt she went out to find something a bit more fitting for herself
12211111.title: The next morning Amy notices some changes...
